Name: ArchiveModuleName
Description: A name for the Archive module. May be expressed in multiple languages. Repeat the element to express names with different content, for example different names for different systems.

Name: Label
Description: A display label for the Archive module. May be expressed in multiple languages. Repeat for labels with different content, for example, labels with differing length limitations.

Name: Description
Description: A description of the content and purpose of the Archive module. May be expressed in multiple languages and supports the use of structured content.

Name: ArchiveSpecific
Description: Contains metadata specific to a particular archive's holding.

Name: OrganizationSchemeReference
Description: A list of the organizations related to the DDI instance. This includes information on the archives responsible for creating and maintaining the instance. All agencies must be defined as an Organization in an Archive schema (which can be defined inline or resolved externally).

Name: LifecycleInformation
Description: LifecycleInformation contains the description of a set of events in the life cycle of the data. It may be extended by specific users.

Name: OtherMaterial
Description: Material related to this item from the archive's perspective.
